Class arjuna.JavaSim.Distributions.ErlangStream 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----arjuna.JavaSim.Distributions.RandomStream
           |
           +----arjuna.JavaSim.Distributions.ErlangStream
public class ErlangStream
extends RandomStream
Returns a number from an Erlang distribution with the given mean and standard deviation.

ErlangStream(double, double)
Create a stream with mean 'm' and standard deviation 'sd'.
ErlangStream(double, double, int)
Create a stream with mean 'm' and standard deviation 'sd'.
ErlangStream(double, double, int, long, long)
Create a stream with mean 'm' and standard deviation 'sd'.

getNumber()
Return a stream number.

ErlangStream 
  public ErlangStream(double m,
                      double sd)
Create a stream with mean 'm' and standard deviation 'sd'.

ErlangStream 
  public ErlangStream(double m,
                      double sd,
                      int StreamSelect)
Create a stream with mean 'm' and standard deviation 'sd'. Ignore the first 'StreamSelect' values before starting to return values.

ErlangStream 
  public ErlangStream(double m,
                      double sd,
                      int StreamSelect,
                      long MGSeed,
                      long LCGSeed)
Create a stream with mean 'm' and standard deviation 'sd'. Ignore the first 'StreamSelect' values before starting to return values. The seeds to the RandomStream are 'MGSeed' and 'LGSeed'.

getNumber 
  public double getNumber() throws IOException, ArithmeticException
Return a stream number.
